actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means, H. Rept. 95-534.
Motion to resolve into Committee of Whole House indefinitely postponed in House, division vote (149-33).

official_title: Resolution to disapprove the continuation of the President's authority to waive the freedom of emigration requirements for the granting of most favored nation status to Romania.

summary.text: Disapproves of Presidential authority to waive the freedom of emigration requirements for eligibility for most-favored-nation status with respect to Romania.

titles.title: Resolution to disapprove the continuation of the President's authority to waive the freedom of emigration requirements for the granting of most favored nation status to Romania.
